Articles.Content: 607: Pristine white walls, fresh paint, and checkered floor tiles.
608 - the cake is a lie
609 - You meet GLaDOS, turn, and run to 610
Floor 610: Neurotoxin production room. (No. 2 maybe? Pretty sure that was posted before, but what the heck.)
floor 611- Neurotoxin testing room, after many hours of pain and anguish the toxins stop long enough for you to recover and move on to room 612
Floor 612 - SCP Foundation Containment Site-19. You run to Floor 613 while flashing a fake ID to some guards. You will need this ID for Floor 613
Floor 613: SCP-173 you stare at it until you make it up the stair well as you enter the next floor you hear 2 doors closing the one behind you and a grate in the vent
Have I turned this into the Enrichment Center?
Floor 614:Look it Maithwaite Station ,and there be the express,
Floor 615 - Getting close to SCP-682, are you?

floor 616- find remains of SCP-682 inside there is a gas mask with 2 filters and a roll of ducktape but you only have time to grabe one (these items can be used when ever) (ducktape 20 uses of 3 foot segments) (gas mask 1 time per filter) then move on to floor 617
Floor 617 - The sun is being consumed by a black hole! You run to Floor 618

Floor 618- The MIB Kerbin Headquarters. You see Will Smith Kerman jumping off floor 619 to save the KeLorean time machine in a kerbal movie picture universe. Also, Kordan Freeman is waiting for you, and he gives you the holy crowbar. Do you keep the Portal Gun or take is holy crowbar?
Floor 619 - The MilkyWay Galaxy slamming into the Andromeda Galaxy while hackers hack into the Global Kriminal Database
Floor 620- The Classified level. what you know about this level might be too much.
Floor 621 - The floor to watch Earth die due to a Neutron Star

Floor 622- The Nexus Simulator: The only simulator where you simulate everything... don't set time warp to x999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999929999999999999999999999999999979... that will make you lose track of everything.

Floor 623 It's the 600th anniversary pizza party of the 0.21 13 KerBillion dollar space center overhaul!

Edited November 15, 2013 by TADBTD
Floor 624 - A sign saying "The previous floor was 623" orbiting a Solar System
floor 625- private oblivious has no idea that your here and is staring where you are
Floor 626 - Said Solar System burning said Private
Floor 627- Huh there is a Train station to the mainland.
Floor 628- A skaian gate saying: ENTER ME TO BEAT SBURB

floor 629- after beating the SBURB you find your self in a parallel universe were cats rule the world and are hunting you and the rest of humanity to extinction (you suspect its the inprobobility drive acting weird agian but its to late to fix it now)

((hm it seems that i have killed this thread at least for the moment))

Edited November 19, 2013 by toolofdarkness
concern
Floor 630 - Someone needs to die here. It's you, if you don't run
